message.description: This is the text Nao will say

function.name: rest
function.description: Makes Nao robot reset to stable posture

function.name: wave
function.description: Makes Nao robot wave to the client. A greeting to new clients.

hand.description: define which hand to wave with

function.name: sit
function.description: Makes Nao robot sit down with butt on the floor. Can make the user feel more relaxed.

function.name: nod
function.description: Makes Nao robot nod head to agree with the user.

function.name: shake_hand
function.description: Makes Nao robot prentend shake client's hand. Can be used to greet the user and make them feel welcome.

hand.description: define which hand to shake with

function.name: walk
function.description: Makes Nao robot walk with specified (x, y in meters) and theta(in radians). DO NOT include x or y values larger than 0.3. Instead, send durections in smaller steps like walk(0.3,0,0), walk(0, 0.3,0), walk(0.3,0,math.pi/2) to make it walk forward and then turn left for example.

x.description: Distance to walk forward in meters

y.description: Distance to walk sideways in meters

function.name: adjust_volume
function.description: Adjusts the volume that the Nao robot speaks at. The default volume is set at 20.0. Please set the volume before calling the speak action you wish to change the volume for.

level.description: float vvalue that the speaking volume is set to

function.name: track_face
function.description: Enable/diusables the nao to follow the user's face with face tracking

enable.description: boolean value to enable or disable face tracking

function.name: point_at
function.description: Can point with robot hand at anything to emphasize an object in the room to the client. Moves robot arm with specifed roll, pitch, yaw open or closed hand. Can be used to point or hold things. Must call rest action function to return arm to normal position

x.description: Distance to move arm in meters on x axis

y.description: Distance to move armin meters on y axis

z.description: Distance to  move arm in meters on z axis

open.description: boolean value to open or close hand

side.description: value can either be left or right to specify which side to move arm

function.name: rest_arm
function.description: Resets both NAO robot arms in a resting position for when an arm action is complete

function.name: rest_body
function.description: Resets entire NAO body in a resting position for when an posture action is complete

function.name: move_head
function.description: Use to look and change your visual perception of the room. Helps the Nao look around. Moves robot head with specifed pitch, yaw to look at different things. A prompt may be provided to instruct the nao robot with the updated head (camera) position

x.description: Distance to turn head left and right in radians

z.description: Distance to  tilt head in radians up and down

prompt.description: new prompt to specify things to describe or look for. the response will answer this prompt

function.name: wait
function.description: makes the robot pause for a specified amount of time

seconds.description: time in seconds to pause the robot

function.name: reason_with_vision
function.description: Call when you need to see or use vision. Accesses nthe camera. Key words: see, find, look. You should use it frequently, especially after moving the head to a new direction.

prompt.description: prompt to direct nao on what to observe or describe
